title: Splash logo replacement, Dashboard header logo removal, and shorter course card

requirements.summary: Replace Splash Screen AppLogo with the new static PSC-preparation PNG and update tagline text to exactly "सफलता को साथी".
acceptanceCriteria: On the splash screen, the logo shown is the new PSC-preparation PNG (not the current AppLogo globe/education logo).
The splash screen tagline text is exactly "सफलता को साथी" (same spelling and spacing).
No other splash screen content (e.g., title timing/navigation behavior) regresses.

file_operations.description: Add the required generated static PNG asset for the new splash logo (PSC exam preparation logo illustration). Keep it served directly from the frontend public assets per constraints.

Remove AppLogo usage on the splash screen and render the static image from frontend/public/assets/generated/psc-study-logo.dim_512x512.png. Update the tagline text to exactly "सफलता को साथी" while preserving existing splash timing, animations, and scroll-lock behavior.

requirements.summary: Remove the AppLogo from the main Dashboard header row while keeping the header aligned and balanced.
acceptanceCriteria: The Dashboard header no longer renders the AppLogo image next to the avatar/title.
Header layout remains aligned and visually balanced after removing the logo.

file_operations.description: Remove the AppLogo import and the <AppLogo /> element from the header row. Adjust spacing/alignment classes in the header container if needed so the Avatar and title remain visually balanced.

requirements.summary: Reduce the vertical size of the "खरिदार तयारी कोर्स" course card on the Dashboard without changing its width or the left/right/top visual edges.
acceptanceCriteria: The Dashboard course card is visibly shorter in height than before (less vertical padding/space), without changing its overall width.
The card’s left/right/top visual boundaries remain consistent with the current style; only the vertical size is reduced.
Course carousel and course text remain readable and not clipped on common mobile viewport sizes.

file_operations.description: Tune the course Card layout to be shorter by reducing vertical padding and/or internal vertical spacing (e.g., Card padding and space-y/margins around the carousel) while keeping the card’s gradient, width, and top/left/right boundaries consistent. Ensure carousel aspect ratio remains intact and text is not clipped on mobile.
